column7: Type of Information Asset [Hard copy, Electronic File (specify type), removable media/device (specify type)]

column6: Form used to initiate the new starter process and sent to UNIT B via email.
column16: On PC of line manager, stored on network.  For some line managers, they store these files on their laptop.  Unlikely to be password protected.
column17: Form is emailed to UNIT B using internal email system.  It is then held on System A and System B by UNIT B.
